reviewText:
A stereotypical Japanese salaryman has finally made it. Years of school, hard work and suffering have finally paid off. He will climb the final rung on the corporate ladder -- until circumstances intervene. Our blankly reserved, urbane hero, Hirata, finds himself lost and utterly clueless in Iceland. Part of the fun is watching his hangdog expression as he stoically forges through one bizarre indignity after another.

Beautiful shots of stark, intense Icelandic scenery, and a very humane, understated comedy.

It's criminal... totally criminal that this isn't available in region 1.
